about_the_game:
WEAPONS? MAGIC? BOTH.

Choose YOUR weapon - The Parry Master Sword. The Magic Enhancing Chakram. The Lifesteal Lich Hammer. The list goes on.
Wield Ancient Magic - Some Powers annihilate crowds, some are boss-killers, some enhance your weapon. Mix and match Weapons and Powers to create YOUR PERFECT BUILD.

LEGENDARY WEAPONRY

Classic balanced Swords. Heavy, devastating Hammers. Rapid, ranged Chakrams. Find multiple legendary weapons each with unique passive powers to suit YOUR playstyle.

MIGHTY MAGIC

Soul Crests are ancient magic items that hold the essence of long-forgotten warriors. Each Crest grants Powers that let you live your wildest battlemage fantasies.

A METROIDVANIA WORLD

Grapple, Glide, Summon Platforms and more! Find Artifices to unlock the world and discover its deepest secrets. Experience the thrill of exploration with the challenge of platforming.

MORE FEATURES

  • Quests, everywhere: Find characters to help and mysteries to solve throughout the world. Beware the consequences of certain choices.
  • Living World: Each biome has its theme, lore, dangers, and challenges.
  • Weapon Stat System: Each unique weapon has stats that can be unlocked by defeating enemies and bosses, and upgrading at the vendor.
  • Fully-voiced Story: Every line of dialogue is performed by a talented cast of voice actors.
  • Interconnected Map: Explore as you wish. Gain abilities to unlock areas. Find shortcuts, hidden passages, and more.
  • Memorable Boss Fights: Bosses will test you to your limits. Beating them will require skill, tactical-thinking, and unlocking the full potential of your weapons and powers.

And so much more.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac Mini late 2012 and newer; Mac Pro late 2013 and newer; MacBook 2015 and newer

short_description: Become the ultimate warrior mage. Find Legendary Weapons and Devastating Powers to create the perfect build as you search for your old mercenary comrades in a cursed land. Encounter deadly boss fights, epic quests, and challenging platforming in a world broken by an ancient wrath.
